text: Cool, actually that is was I was hoping to take home from this as well! Before the NFTS I was studing in Italy Graphic Desing but we always had classes about video, photography post and even some vfx so basicaly this course is to narrow down to one craft and specialize rather than introducing me to the world of post-production. Just to have a better idea, how many lighters/compers do you work with at Blue Zoo? And since I know that the main thing in BZ is animation, what do you find different from live action?
